articles.author: Patrick Holland
articles.title: iPhone 12 Pro and ProRaw photos: Everything to know about Apple's new picture file - CNET
articles.description: Photo nerds, behold! The developer beta of iOS 14.3 gives us a glimpse at how Apple ProRaw photos work and exactly what they are.
articles.content: The developer beta of iOS 14.3 brings with it Apple ProRaw photo support on the iPhone 12 Pro and 12 Pro Max. Once you enable ProRaw, you'll see a new "RAW" button at the top right of the native came… [+4152 chars]

articles.title: Microsoft Surface Pro X (SQ2) review: Still the best Windows tablet - Neowin
articles.description: Microsoft's Surface Pro X refresh is really just considered to be a new configuration of the existing model. It has a new chipset, comes in a new Platinum color, and has new accessories.
articles.content: Almost exactly a year ago, I reviewed the original Surface Pro X saying that it's the perfect portable PC (for me). It was my favorite PC of 2019, and thanks to a minor refresh, it's my favorite PC o… [+15173 chars]
